definition.text: Each strategy specializes in specific market conditions by analyzing the state of the market on different time frames!

paragraphs.text: Take a look at the name of each strategy... 3H Down, 2H Down, 4H Up...
If you study the conditions that define the trigger on event, you will notice that 3H Down referes to the fact that the particular strategy is triggered when the 3-hour time frame is in a downwtrend.
Each of the strategies speciallizes on a certain time frame and trend!
